item.title: ((how do i update after adding a object so it apears!))
item.dc:creator: @gs1 gs
item.description:
@gs1 wrote:

i dont feel like telling how 2 make a shop but to add items…
find the npc u want on ure server that has a shop get his shop name
go to shops.cfg file in the S’s it has no double then press ctrl f then type than type the name of the shop in
then go to where the last item was entered then put the item u wanna add then the amt u want in the shop like this

6570 10 that would put 10 firecapes in the shop put a tab between each item and item amount

Read full topic
